content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 1/2 cups instant hot chocolate mix" )

content.text: 0) Sift together creamer, hot chocolate mix, instant coffee, cinnamon and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "creamer"@17:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "hot chocolate mix"@26:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "instant coffee"@45:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cinnamon"@61:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "nutmeg"@74:80 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Pour into a jar and seal with a lid.
2) To prepare: Stir 3 teaspoons of mixture into 1 cup of hot water.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir"@15:19 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-2-0 "To prepare"@3:13 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( "3 teaspoons of mixture"@20:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "1 cup of hot water"@48:66 / FOOD )
	)
)
